title: This picture of a massive seahorse fossil is FAKE | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture is being shared on social media with a claim that a massive seahorse fossil has been found in Australia.

When we fact-checked the post, we found it to be fake.

On putting the picture through Reverse Image Search, we gathered that the image has been morphed using photoshop software.

We found the image on pxleyes.com. The picture won the first prize in the Amazing Fossils – Photoshop Contest.

The artist ‘loopyluv‘ also put out each step that led to the final product.

This proves that the viral post is FAKE.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
